title: In two games, Utah lost to one of the highest paid NIL teams in CBB, a top 15 team in the country, a future number one d...
summary:
In two games, Utah lost to one of the highest paid NIL teams in CBB, a top 15 team in the country, a future number one draft pick, by a total of 18 points. 

Both games I was told by so many that BYU would win by 30 in each contest. 

Utah is better than they are given credit for

title: I appreciate President Trump’s encouragement to repeal Prop 4 in Utah. I believe in representative government and signed...
